channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.7.2
item.description:
This update no longer includes PostgreSQL 11 since it is no longer supported.

Do not install this update if you are still using PostgreSQL 11.

If you are still using PostgreSQL 11, please migrate your database to a newer version before installing this upgrade.

  • PostgreSQL 12.18 with PostGIS 3.0.10
  • PostgreSQL 13.14 with PostGIS 3.1.10
  • PostgreSQL 14.11 with PostGIS 3.2.6
  • PostgreSQL 15.6 with PostGIS 3.3.5
  • PostgreSQL 16.2 with PostGIS 3.4.1

For improved security, Postgres.app now shows a permission prompt when an app attempts to connect for the first time. More information

You can find more info on the Github Releases Page.
